display_name: Act out dreams - Episodes per week
description: During sleep, how often do you (or have been told that you) shout, scream, punch or flail your arms in the air?
calculation: If par_0510=0 then par_0520=par_0500*7, If par_0510=1 then par_0520=par_0500,    If par_0510=2 then par_0520=par_0500/4, If par_0510=3 then par_0520=par_0500/52
